Activity: Morning routine. Check emails. Do a quick search for any new tools or techniques that could improve the asset creation pipeline.
Prepare a short presentation summarizing the technical requirements for art assets. Include visuals from the test scene to illustrate the key points. Make it engaging and easy to understand.

Present the technical requirements and test scene results to @Leon, @Ricardo, @Fatima, @Mei, @Aisha, @Javier, and @David. Gather feedback and answer any questions. Be prepared to defend my choices but also open to suggestions.

Incorporate feedback from the presentation into the technical requirements document. Make sure everyone is on the same page regarding the asset creation process.
Start working on a simple shader to test the visual look of the assets in the game engine. Experiment with different material properties and lighting effects.
Continue experimenting with the shader. Document the shader parameters and their impact on the visual look of the assets.
Wrap up the day. Back up all my work. Maybe play a quick game of Apex Legends to unwind.
